long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pillar is an interview intelligence platform that empowers teams to hire the right talent effectively, efficiently, and equitably. The Pillar Chrome extension makes it easy to conduct quality interviews by providing real-time guidance and questions based on set skills for the role. This way you can train your team members to become better interviewers while standardizing and structuring your interview process. 

With the Pillar Chrome extension, you can:
- Coordinate interviews and question recommendations, helping you execute better interviews and provide a better candidate experience
- Capture real-time feedback on candidates and notes from every interviewer so you hire the right talent every time
- Provide in-meeting guidance to ensure a consistent, equitable hiring process for all candidates 

Ready to get started? Schedule a demo today at pillar.hr/get-a-demo.
